channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Conditional Payment Methods for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Conditional Payment Methods for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2022-4547|2024-08-03T01:41:45.616Z -- unknown -- conditional%20payment%20methods%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Conditional Payment Methods for WooCommerce WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by [high privilege users such as admin|users with a role as low as admin.
